snippet: As fighting continued across the country, President Bashar al-Assad made a rare public appearance, joining prayers for the Eid al-Adha holiday at a mosque in Damascus.
abstract: Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad makes rare public appearance, joining prayers for the Eid al-Adha holiday at a mosque in Damascus, as fighting continues across the country.
lead_paragraph: As fighting continued across the country, President Bashar al-Assad made a rare public appearance, joining prayers for the Eid al-Adha holiday at a mosque in Damascus.

headline.main: Fighting on Multiple Fronts in Syria
